channel.title: ghost on Anurag's Blog

item.title: I switched to Ghost
item.description: As you can see, I switched to ghost. If you go to my first post, I talked about how I wanted to use posthaven and how it is great. I am using posthaven over medium, or blogger, or wordpress, is because of its simplicity. You can read much about posthaven here: https://posthaven.com/ . It has an easy posting format, lets me use my own domain and I can even email my posts.
